SELECT ,usr.user_name ,cd.code_name as access_role_code_name FROM ciams_access_user_link lnk LEFT OUTER JOIN ciams_sso_user usr ON lnk.user_id = usr.login_id LEFT OUTER JOIN ciams_code cd ON lnk.access_role_code = cd.code WHERE 1=1
and lnk.access_role_code = #{roleCode}

SELECT ,cd.code_name as access_role_code_name ,cd2.code_name as access_menu_code_name FROM ciams_access_role_link lnk LEFT OUTER JOIN ciams_code cd ON lnk.access_role_code = cd.code LEFT OUTER JOIN ciams_code cd2 ON lnk.access_menu_code = cd2.code WHERE 1=1
and lnk.access_role_code = #{roleCode}

SELECT DISTINCT usr.user_id, rol.access_menu_code, cd.code, cd.code_name, cd.code_val FROM ciams_access_user_link usr INNER JOIN ciams_access_role_link rol ON usr.access_role_code = rol.access_role_code INNER JOIN ciams_code cd on rol.access_menu_code = cd.code WHERE usr.user_id = #{loginId}
